citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
A documented environmental enhancement plan was present, but not reviewed and approved by the Attending
Veterinarian. The Attending Veterinarian's approval ensures that the plan meets current professional standards, and that
any special considerations for birds needing individual management are appropriate. The facility must obtain approval
from the Attending Veterinarian for the environmental enhancement plan for psychological well being of birds.
Correct by February 11, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n
